content: Want a baby with blonde hair and green eyes? No problem. A Los Angeles fertility clinic is offering a new service that would allow couples to choose their baby's physical traits, including eye and hair color, the BBC reported. The LA Fertility Institutes said it has already received half a dozen requests for the service and expects the first designer baby to be born next year. "I would not say this is a dangerous road," Jeff Steinberg, director of the clinic, told the BBC. "It's an uncharted road." +++http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/health/7918296.stm This message has been edited. Last edited by: R102, Tue 03 March 2009 12:45 PM
reply: Want a baby with blonde hair and green eyes? No problem. "I would not say this is a dangerous road," Jeff Steinberg, director of the clinic, told the BBC. "It's an uncharted road." +++http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/health/7918296.stm This message has been edited. Last edited by: R102, Tue 03 March 2009 12:45 PM
title: Design your perfect baby and impress ya friends!

Tampering with how God designed our genes is playing with fire that we cannot control the consequences of... basic genetic ARE enough people just need to be more selective in the use of them.

content: Every time I read of such stuff, I'm reminded of these two verses from the Bible: (2 Timothy 3:1-5 NIV) But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. {2} People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, {3} without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, {4} treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God-- {5} having a form of godliness but denying its power. Have nothing to do with them. Mat 24:22 And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: ...

content: Im not pleased but also not surprised. Already there were methods for "spinning sperm" to manipulate the sex of your unborn [via IVF OR IVC] as far as choosing a partner more carefully well I choose my partner based on him and his attributes and the type of parent he would be.Never occured to me that I should date "tall" or "insert physical attribute here" so I could ensure that potential children would be x y or z. I honestly question anyone whos seeking anything other than a healthy child through genetic screening or manipulation. Thats just MHO though-Ive got beautiful healthy children and wont be having any more.

content: quote: Originally posted by sweetsuds: As creepy as a "designer baby" sounds, I think many would consider such techniques to prevent child(ren) from inheriting a debilitating disease or disability. Maybe these genetic deformities are the delayed results of tampering with the natural order of things as intended? For thoes believers of god, Life is a gift from God. Not something to be created from one of his creations. He has a master plan and life is of his choosing. If you consider that millions of sperm race to fertilize the egg and only one makes it, That is kind of like winning a lottery. Thats Gods choice who wins the race and occupies a place on earth. That has to be part of the master plan for believers and everything has a reason. So once you tamper with the natural order of things you upset the master plan. Maybe man was never meant to cross breed with other races and share genetic makeups? A good question would be if that were the natural order of the master plan then why were different races created? When these questions are answered then we can begin to discuss laboratory experiments.

content: There are many people manipulating the sex of their baby now, couples receiving donor eggs and sperm. They choose the characteristics from certain donors. Other cultures abort male or female babies because it is not what they want. This is just the next step up. Most people want tall, athletic children with good looks. Not all people will have children like that if they do not have the genes to make it happen. So I am not sure what the next level of creation will be. I totally understand if there are genetic diseases involved, but this type of baby making is more on the line of perfection.
